summary: Renames the days of the week to there historic Norse equivalent!
descriptionHtml:
Hi Guys,Norse Days of the Week renames the days of the week so that they are historically accurate with the exception of Sun' s day (Secunda's Day) and Moon's Day (Masser's Day). The days of the week are now:Monday      = Masser's DayTuesday     = Mar's  DayWednesda = Odin's DayThursday   = Thor's DayFriday      = Freya's DaySaterday   = Saturn's DaySunday     = Secunda's Day

After watching this really cool video I thought this would be a good idea as the Nordic references fit in quite well:https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2ZexFXEc2OkThis is my first mod. Feed back appreciated.

Hope you like. Have fun. 

:)
author: SteelFox
